title: Payment
description: Represents Money paid by one Party to another in return for goods and services.

dateCleared.description: The date on which the Payment is cleared by a banking system or other payment processing mechanism.
dateCleared.title: Payment.dateCleared schema

dateDue.description: The date on which the payee expects to receive the Payment.
dateDue.title: Payment.dateDue schema

dateMade.description: The date on which the Payment was made by the payer. (This attribute is most likely to be required by the payer's electronic systems.)
dateMade.title: Payment.dateMade schema

dateReceived.description: The date on which the Payment was received by the payee. (This attribute is most likely to be required by the payer's electronic systems.)
dateReceived.title: Payment.dateReceived schema
